title: AIIMS Delhi: Admission 2024, Courses, Fees, Ranking, Cutoff, Placements
meta_description: AIIMS Delhi is the best medical institute in India established in 1956. AIIMS Delhi is an Institute of National Importance ranked 1st in India in the Medical Category by NIRF, India Today, Outlook, and IIRF.
keywords: AIIMS Delhi,AIIMS Delhi Admission,AIIMS Delhi MBBS,AIIMS Delhi Ranking,AIIMS Delhi MBBS Fees,AIIMS Delhi Fees,AIIMS Delhi Exam,AIIMS Delhi Placements,AIIMS Delhi Cutoff

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Highlights
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi is the most coveted medical college and research university in India. Here are some of the highlights of AIIMS New Delhi:

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Ranking
description: AIIMS Delhi is the top-ranked medical college in India by various reputed national and international ranking bodies. The institute has consistently been ranked 1st in India by NIRF, India Today, IIRF, and Outlook in the field of Medicine. Here is AIIMS Delhi Ranking in India through various ranking bodies:

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Courses and Fees
description: AIIMS Delhi offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Super Specialty, Doctoral, and Fellowship programs in the streams of Medical, Nursing, Dental, Allied Health Sciences, and Paramedical. MBBS, MD, MS, B.Sc Nursing, DM, M.Ch, M.Sc Nursing, and B.Sc (Allied Health Sciences) are the major courses offered by AIIMS Delhi.
The detailed information about the AIIMS Delhi Courses and Fees is mentioned below:

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Cutoff 2024
description: AIIMS Delhi offers admission to MD/ MS/ MCh/ DM/ MDS programs through INI CET and MBBS through NEET. AIIMS Delhi Cutoff is the minimum rank required by the candidate to get admission to the respective course at the institute.

description: AIIMS Delhi provides paid internships and placement opportunities to all UG and PG students in its hospital and other government hospitals. The key highlights of AIIMS Delhi Placements as per AIIMS Delhi NIRF Report 2023 are as follows:

description: Students at AIIMS Delhi are eligible for various merit-based and need-based scholarships. The various AIIMS Delhi Scholarships are as follows:

basic_info.name: How is Student Life at AIIMS Delhi?
description: AIIMS Delhi is the dream of every medical aspirant in India to pursue MBBS. Life at AIIMS Delhi can be both challenging and rewarding owing to the prestige and academics of the institute.

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Academics
description: AIIMS Delhi is known for its rigorous academics and high standards of excellence. As a student, one is expected to receive top-notch medical education, access to state-of-the-art facilities, and opportunities to work with the best medical professionals and researchers, which in turn might be challenging for students. The academic load can be demanding, however, it does provide an incredibly enriching learning experience with access to a diverse patient population and a vibrant cultural experience.

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Campus Life
description: Life at AIIMS Delhi isn’t just limited to academics. Students are exposed to various co-curricular activities and fests. Pulse, Asia’s largest medical college fest is organized every year by the institute with thousands of people. The fest includes socio-cultural events, literary events, sports, concerts, art events, dramas, dance, etc. Additionally, AIIMS Delhi Campus is located in the heart of Delhi, providing easy access to the city's rich cultural and historical attractions, that can be explored by students during their free time.

basic_info.name: AIIMS Delhi Campus
description: AIIMS Delhi Campus is located at Sri Aurobindo Marg, Ansari Nagar East, New Delhi. AIIMS offers a whole range of facilities to its students, from hostel accommodations to cafes within the campus. Here’s a detailed list of facility provisions at AIIMS Delhi:

faqs.question: What is the fees for MBBS at AIIMS Delhi?
faqs.answer: AIIMS Delhi MBBS Fees is INR 5,856 for the entire course duration of 5.5 Years. The total course fee of MBBS at AIIMS Delhi comprises the Academic Fee of INR 1,628 and Hostel and Other Charges of INR 4,228. Candidates are required to pay the entire fee amount at the time of admission only.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to AIIMS Delhi?
faqs.answer: AIIMS Delhi is the topmost medical college in India. To get admission to MBBS at the institute, candidates have to appear for NEET UG and should have the set cutoff score in the exam to secure admission. For PG Courses such as MD and MS, candidates have to appear for INI CET. For B.Sc Nursing and M.Sc Nursing, the institute conducts its own entrance exam for admission.

faqs.question: How many seats are offered for MBBS at AIIMS Delhi?
Can I get into AIIMS Delhi with NEET PG?
faqs.answer: AIIMS Delhi offers a total of 125 Seats for MBBS. Out of these seats, 49 Seats are for General Category, 32 Seats for OBC, 18 Seats for SC, 8 Seats for ST, and the rest for the other categories. Apart from that, the institute also offers 7 Extra Seats under the Foreign Country Quota.

faqs.question: Is AIIMS Delhi the best college for MBBS?
faqs.answer: No, AIIMS Delhi conducts its own entrance exam, INI CET (Institute of National Importance Combined Entrance Test), for admission to its PG courses such as MD, MS, and MDS. The institute doesn’t accept NEET PG for admission to PG Courses.Ques. Is AIIMS Delhi the best college for MBBS?AIIMS Delhi is regarded as the best medical institute in India for MBBS known for its excellent learning experience, faculty, infrastructure, research opportunities, and clinical exposure. It has been ranked 1stin India in the Medical Category by all major ranking bodies including NIRF, India Today, Outlook, and IIRF. The institute has state-of-the-art infrastructure, well-equipped laboratories, libraries, and one of the most advanced medical facilities in India, providing students with ample resources for learning and research. AIIMS Delhi MBBS fees is also extremely affordable, i.e. INR 5,856 for the entire course, giving it another reason for being the top choice for MBBS in India.Ques. How to get into AIIMS Delhi?Candidates seeking admission to any course at AIIMS Delhi have to appear for the respective entrance exam. Admission to MBBS at AIIMS Delhi is based on the score in NEET UG. For PG and Super Specialty Courses such as MD/ MS/ MDS, and DM/ M.Ch, the admission is based on INI CET and INI SS, respectively. For B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing, and other courses, the institute conducts its own entrance exams.

faqs.answer: AIIMS Delhi offers UG, PG, Super Specialty, and Doctoral Courses in the fields of Medicine and Nursing. MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, B.Sc (AHS), MD, MS, MDS, M.Sc Nursing, M.Sc, DM, M.Ch, and Ph.D. are some of the major courses offered by the institute.

faqs.question: Is AIIMS Delhi good for research?
faqs.answer: There are hostel facilities for AIIMS students in the Ansari Nagar campus hostel such as TV rooms, a playground, a Volleyball and basketball court, a gymnasium, and a swimming pool in the Ansari Nagar campus.

faqs.question: What are the documents required at the time of admission to AIIMS Delhi?
faqs.answer: AIIMS Delhi is highly regarded and known for its research activities and is considered one of the premier institutions for medical research in India. The institute boasts state-of-the-art research facilities, including well-equipped laboratories, advanced imaging centers, and specialized research units. The facilities at the institute support a wide range of research activities across various disciplines, from basic sciences to clinical research which is far more advanced than any other medical institute in India. AIIMS Delhi is also known to provide a significant volume of research output, including scientific publications, patents, and innovations, which makes it undoubtedly one of the best research institutes.

faqs.question: Ques. Can a candidate get into AIIMS Delhi with 690 marks?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required at the time of admission to AIIMS Delhi:Migration Certificate2 passport/stamp size photographsMarksheets of 10th and 12th classProvisional Certificate

faqs.question: What are the rules for AIIMS Delhi hostel residents?
faqs.answer: Ans. To get a seat in AIIMS Delhi in the General category, the candidate must have having top NEET rank of up to 50. Marks-wise, if a student has 710 marks, then there are chances of getting a seat. In the OBC category, minimum marks are 700 to 705, and in other categories like SC or ST, the marks range is 675 to 700.

faqs.question: How to apply for AIIMS Delhi Hostel?
faqs.answer: Ans. Any undergraduate or postgraduate student or research scholar of the All India Institute of Medical Sciences or an elective student or trainee duly allotted accommodation by the Superintendent of Hostels is considered a resident of a hostel.

faqs.question: Can I get AIIMS Delhi with 650 marks?
faqs.answer: Ans. Allotment of AIIMS Delhi Hostel is done based on an application made on the prescribed form available in AIIMS official website. All the Hostel forms (No dues form, vehicle pass form, residence proof form, Application for hostel accommodation forms single /married, Change of room form, Wi-fi form, HRA form) are available on AIIMS Hostel Website.Ques. Can I get AIIMS Delhi with 650 marks?No, getting admission to AIIMS Delhi with 650 Marks in NEET UG is not possible in most cases due to the extremely high cutoff and competition. General Category Candidates must have a score of 715+ for a sure chance while the reserved category candidates must aim to score above 700+ to get admission at the institute.

faqs.question: Why to choose AIIMS Delhi?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required at AIIMS Delhi counseling:Admit cardMatriculation/HSC certificate for date of birthMarksheets of the qualifying examDegree/Provisional passing certificateMigration certificateNo objection certificate for govt employed candidatesPhysical disability certificate if applicableCategory certificate if applicable

faqs.question: What are the key collaborations of AIIMS Delhi?
faqs.answer: Ans. AIIMS Delhi offers courses in medical and para-medical fields at UG, PG, and doctoral levels. Some of the academic advantages of the institute are given below.The Institute provides necessary facilities for teaching, research, and patient care.The teaching faculty of the institute are practicing doctors and professional doctors.It is one of the prestigious colleges in the field of medical sciences. The institute works with international universities for joint research and also offers a student exchange program.

Section.name: About AIIMS Delhi
Section.description:
All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi (AIIMS Delhi) is considered the best medical institute in India ranked 1st in the Medical Category by NIRF, India Today, Outlook, and IIRF. AIIMS Delhi is the first AIIMS in India established in 1956 under an Act of Parliament. Recognized as an ‘Institute of National Importance’ by the Government of India, it currently operates autonomously under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare. AIIMS Delhi has also been ranked 127th in Medicine globally by QS World University Rankings 2024.
AIIMS Delhi offers UG, PG, and Doctoral courses under its 40+ departments across Medicine, Dentistry, Nursing, and Paramedical. AIIMS Delhi MBBS is considered to be the top choice for every medical aspirant in India. The institute offers a total of 125 seats for MBBS annually. AIIMS Delhi fees for MBBS is INR 5,856 for the entire course. Apart from MBBS, the institute is equally popular for its other UG and PG programs such as B.Sc Nursing, B.Sc Paramedical, MD, MS, and Ph.D. It accepts national-level entrance exams such as NEET UG and INI CET for admission to MBBS and MD/MS/MDS, respectively. AIIMS Delhi is the leading institute for medical research in India having more than 600 Research Publications by its faculty and researchers in a year.
Table of Content
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi is the most coveted medical college and research university in India. Here are some of the highlights of AIIMS New Delhi:
1st in Medical Category
AIIMS Delhi is the top-ranked medical college in India by various reputed national and international ranking bodies. The institute has consistently been ranked 1st in India by NIRF, India Today, IIRF, and Outlook in the field of Medicine. Here is AIIMS Delhi Ranking in India through various ranking bodies:
AIIMS Delhi offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Super Specialty, Doctoral, and Fellowship programs in the streams of Medical, Nursing, Dental, Allied Health Sciences, and Paramedical. MBBS, MD, MS, B.Sc Nursing, DM, M.Ch, M.Sc Nursing, and B.Sc (Allied Health Sciences) are the major courses offered by AIIMS Delhi.
The detailed information about the AIIMS Delhi Courses and Fees is mentioned below:
INR 2.045
Admission to all the courses at AIIMS Delhi is entrance-based. AIIMS Delhi Admission involves two major stages- Entrance Exam and Counselling Process. Admission to MBBS at AIIMS Delhi is based on NEET UG. For PG and Super Specialty Courses such as MD/ MS/ MDS, and DM/ M.Ch, the admission is based on INI CET and INI SS, respectively. For B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing, and other courses, the institute conducts its own entrance exams.
Candidates have to first apply for the respective entrance exam and then register for the counseling process accordingly. For MBBS, the candidates need to register for MCC NEET Counselling, while for all other courses, the counseling is conducted by AIIMS itself.
AIIMS Delhi offers admission to MD/ MS/ MCh/ DM/ MDS programs through INI CET and MBBS through NEET. AIIMS Delhi Cutoff is the minimum rank required by the candidate to get admission to the respective course at the institute.

AIIMS Delhi is the dream of every medical aspirant in India to pursue MBBS. Life at AIIMS Delhi can be both challenging and rewarding owing to the prestige and academics of the institute.
AIIMS Delhi is known for its rigorous academics and high standards of excellence. As a student, one is expected to receive top-notch medical education, access to state-of-the-art facilities, and opportunities to work with the best medical professionals and researchers, which in turn might be challenging for students. The academic load can be demanding, however, it does provide an incredibly enriching learning experience with access to a diverse patient population and a vibrant cultural experience.
Life at AIIMS Delhi isn’t just limited to academics. Students are exposed to various co-curricular activities and fests. Pulse, Asia’s largest medical college fest is organized every year by the institute with thousands of people. The fest includes socio-cultural events, literary events, sports, concerts, art events, dramas, dance, etc. Additionally, AIIMS Delhi Campus is located in the heart of Delhi, providing easy access to the city's rich cultural and historical attractions, that can be explored by students during their free time.
AIIMS Delhi Campus is located at Sri Aurobindo Marg, Ansari Nagar East, New Delhi. AIIMS offers a whole range of facilities to its students, from hostel accommodations to cafes within the campus. Here’s a detailed list of facility provisions at AIIMS Delhi:

Ques. What is the fees for MBBS at AIIMS Delhi?
Ans. AIIMS Delhi MBBS Fees is INR 5,856 for the entire course duration of 5.5 Years. The total course fee of MBBS at AIIMS Delhi comprises the Academic Fee of INR 1,628 and Hostel and Other Charges of INR 4,228. Candidates are required to pay the entire fee amount at the time of admission only.
Ques. How can I get admission to AIIMS Delhi?
Ans. AIIMS Delhi is the topmost medical college in India. To get admission to MBBS at the institute, candidates have to appear for NEET UG and should have the set cutoff score in the exam to secure admission. For PG Courses such as MD and MS, candidates have to appear for INI CET. For B.Sc Nursing and M.Sc Nursing, the institute conducts its own entrance exam for admission.
Ques. How many seats are offered for MBBS at AIIMS Delhi?
Ans. AIIMS Delhi offers a total of 125 Seats for MBBS. Out of these seats, 49 Seats are for General Category, 32 Seats for OBC, 18 Seats for SC, 8 Seats for ST, and the rest for the other categories. Apart from that, the institute also offers 7 Extra Seats under the Foreign Country Quota.
Ques. Can I get into AIIMS Delhi with NEET PG?
Ans. No, AIIMS Delhi conducts its own entrance exam, INI CET (Institute of National Importance Combined Entrance Test), for admission to its PG courses such as MD, MS, and MDS. The institute doesn’t accept NEET PG for admission to PG Courses.
Ques. Is AIIMS Delhi the best college for MBBS?

It has been ranked 1st in India in the Medical Category by all major ranking bodies including NIRF, India Today, Outlook, and IIRF. The institute has state-of-the-art infrastructure, well-equipped laboratories, libraries, and one of the most advanced medical facilities in India, providing students with ample resources for learning and research. AIIMS Delhi MBBS fees is also extremely affordable, i.e. INR 5,856 for the entire course, giving it another reason for being the top choice for MBBS in India.

Ans. Candidates seeking admission to any course at AIIMS Delhi have to appear for the respective entrance exam. Admission to MBBS at AIIMS Delhi is based on the score in NEET UG. For PG and Super Specialty Courses such as MD/ MS/ MDS, and DM/ M.Ch, the admission is based on INI CET and INI SS, respectively. For B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing, and other courses, the institute conducts its own entrance exams.

Ans. AIIMS Delhi offers UG, PG, Super Specialty, and Doctoral Courses in the fields of Medicine and Nursing. MBBS, B.Sc Nursing, B.Sc (AHS), MD, MS, MDS, M.Sc Nursing, M.Sc, DM, M.Ch, and Ph.D. are some of the major courses offered by the institute.
